comments.en:
This printer is not designed for usage with a PC, but for TV set-top boxes which provide internet access. Therefore it has a case of the shape of a VCR to easily integrate it in the home entertainment environment.

Nevertheless, this printer provides a standard USB and parallel port and understands PCL 3, which makes it also working as a normal PC printer, at least the developers of HP's "hpjis" driver claim that. Windows drivers seem not to exist for this model (do we have the first linprinter now?).

To get its maximum quality, use the "hpijs" driver. 600 dpi in colour is not supported by the hardware.
